database.name: cms
database.table: CREATE TABLE `##prefix##AdminMenu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `link` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `text` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `role_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `parent` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `priority` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `##prefix##Article` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `url_title` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `author_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `time_created` int(11) NOT NULL, `role` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `hits` int(11) NOT NULL, `time_last_changed` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `##prefix##Menu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `text` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `link` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `role_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `parent` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `priority` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `##prefix##Right` ( `id` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `priority` int(11) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `##prefix##User` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `role_id` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `banned` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `activated` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `last_action` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_registered` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `##prefix##Visitor` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time_visited` int(11) NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `referrer` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `user_agent` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `querystring` varchar(500) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
